snippet: Despite Sunday’s blowout victory over the Browns, the Giants have consistently struggled to do what they have done so well for years: contain running backs and punish quarterbacks.
abstract: New York Giants express concerns about the lackluster play of their once dominant defensive line.
lead_paragraph: Despite Sunday’s blowout victory over the Browns, the Giants have consistently struggled to do what they have done so well for years: contain running backs and punish quarterbacks.

headline.seo: Giants Defense Struggling to Pressure Quarterbacks
headline.main: Giants Defense Faces Pressure After Browns Saw Little of It
headline.print_headline: Giants Defense Faces Pressure After Browns Saw Little of It
